common.title: OWL Construction & Operations Manual
common.description: Modular Knowledge Base for Open Learning Spaces

hero.title: OWL Construction & Operations Manual
hero.subtitle: Open Wisdom Lab
hero.description: A complete guide from philosophy to practice — nine core modules, three-layer content architecture, helping you build creative open learning spaces.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Three steps to begin your OWL journey

step1.title: Choose a Reading Path
step1.description: Select the right module combination based on your goals

step2.title: Read Core Content
step2.description: Each module's core layer provides essential knowledge

step3.title: Deep Dive Extended
step3.description: Extended layer offers advanced topics and best practices

paths.title: Reading Paths
paths.description: Choose a reading order based on your goals, each path is carefully designed

new-node.title: New Node Setup
new-node.subtitle: Build an OWL from scratch
new-node.description: For teams wanting to create a new lab, covering the complete process from philosophy to operations

curriculum.title: Curriculum Development
curriculum.subtitle: Design effective learning experiences
curriculum.description: Focus on instructional design, including curriculum planning, project design, and assessment methods

compliance.title: Compliance Audit
compliance.subtitle: Ensure safety and regulatory compliance
compliance.description: Emphasizes safety compliance, suitable for annual audits or risk assessments

modules.title: Knowledge Base Modules
modules.description: Nine core modules covering the full lifecycle of maker spaces, each with three layers: Core (quick start), Extended (deep learning), and Evidence (academic support)

architecture.title: Three-Layer Content Architecture
architecture.description: Each module adopts the same three-layer structure to meet different learning depth needs

core.title: Core Layer
core.description: Essential knowledge and key principles, quickly grasp module essentials

extend.title: Extended Layer
extend.description: Deep topics and best practices for advanced learning

evidence.title: Evidence Layer
evidence.description: Research support and references, academic verification and citation sources

tools.title: Supporting Tools
tools.description: AI-powered design and planning tools for easier creation

lab.title: AI Space Design Tools
lab.description: Design and visualize your lab space with AI assistance, intelligent configuration recommendations

community.title: Join the Community
community.description: OWL is an open source project, welcome to contribute your experience and wisdom

M01.title: Philosophy & Theory
M01.description: OWL's purpose and theoretical foundation — constructivism, 4P theory of creative learning, design thinking, answering the 'why'

M02.title: Governance & Network
M02.description: Organizational forms and collaboration rules — distributed network architecture, node classification, partnership models

M03.title: Space & Environment
M03.description: Innovation-friendly learning environments — physical space design, digital environment setup, cultural atmosphere, trinity of space

M04.title: Courses & Projects
M04.description: Effective learning experience design — Understanding by Design (UbD), Project-Based Learning (PBL), AI integration

M05.title: Tools & Assets
M05.description: Equipment management enabling creation — equipment classification, digital fabrication, open source hardware ecosystem

M06.title: Safety & Ethics
M06.description: Safety guidelines and ethical standards — three-layer safety architecture, risk assessment, AI ethics norms

M07.title: People & Capability
M07.description: Cultivating those who ignite learners — role-capability matrix, E0-E3 capability levels, instructor certification

M08.title: Operations Manual
M08.description: Smooth and natural operations — Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), membership system, community culture

M09.title: Assessment & Impact
M09.description: Seeing growth and proving value — multi-dimensional assessment, portfolio, digital literacy profile

lab.title: Lab Space Designer
lab.description: Design and visualize lab spaces with intelligent assistance

floor-plan.title: Floor Plan Editor
floor-plan.description: Interactive canvas for designing lab layouts with AI-assisted zone placement and optimization.

concepts.title: Concept Visualizer
concepts.description: Generate concept diagrams and architectural visualizations using AI image generation.

case-studies.title: Case Studies
case-studies.description: Browse real-world lab designs and learn from industry best practices.

ai-design.title: AI Design Assistant
ai-design.description: Natural language interface for layout generation

interactive.title: Interactive Canvas
interactive.description: Drag-and-drop zone editor with real-time preview

export.title: Multi-format Export
export.description: Export to PNG, PDF, JSON, or Markdown

multilang.title: Multi-language
multilang.description: Full support for English and Chinese

chat.title: AI Design Assistant
chat.subtitle: Powered by Claude
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI design assistant. I can help you create and modify lab layouts.
chat.placeholder: Ask me to modify the layout...
chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

prompts.optimize: Optimize the current layout for better workflow efficiency
prompts.addServer: Add a GPU server room with proper cooling
prompts.addMeeting: Add a meeting room for team collaboration
prompts.suggest: Analyze the layout and suggest improvements
